Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory519.png
Yarha
Aaargh!
PanelActor1Shake
Half-lying on the floor, Yarha draws his pistol and keeps shooting the Corrupted before him, finally taking it down before it can reach him.
Yarha
Ha... W-what the hell... I'm not exactly a bad shot.

Before he can feel too good about himself, a gush of wind erupts above him. A giant metal hammer sweeps five centimeters above his head, hitting the Corrupted that sneaked up behind him, sending it flying.
Karenina
Are you hurt, Yarha? Didn't think you had it in you!
Yarha
I'm fine... I used to be a soldier, after all...
What he did not say was that Karenina swinging her hammer is way more dangerous than any Corrupted.
Karenina
There are no serums in this place. It's going to be very bad if you get infected...

Before she can finish, the Inver-Devices on her head suddenly stand, alerting her of an incoming Corrupted. The claws of the Corrupted are no match for Karenina's hammer, and it is quickly hurled away by her swing.
The highly-sensitive Inver-Devices were created to detect the slightest hint of the Punishing Virus that could appear when they activated the zero-point engine. Now, they come in extremely handy.
Still, what Karenina has done is only a drop in the bucket. More Corrupted are gathering here, and Karenina can only watch, unable to attack in full force with all the delicate machines in the room.
Karenina
Hey! T-E-D-D-Y! Can you hear me?
Karenina's comms terminal has been scrambled all this time for some reason. Such a serious interference has never happened before.
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory585.jpg
Teddy
I hear you, I hear you... I had my headphones on! You almost ruptured my eardrums... Hold on. Why are there gunshots in the lab?
Karenina

Listen... There are a lot of Corrupted here! I don't know how... but their number is increasing! Many models used to develop the new specialized frame have been infected, and they've turned into Corrupted...
Teddy
Are you sure you're not dreaming...? This is the Moon! Where is the Punishing Virus coming from?
Karenina
How the hell would I know?! Stop interrupting me... and get here ASAP! I need people to move the wounded and stop the Corrupted from spreading!
Karenina kicks a fallen Kurono soldier away from a Corrupted attack before hammering the Corrupted into the laboratory's wall with a backhand.
Teddy
People are hurt? Are people infected...?
Karenina
Ugh... No! Not yet! Just the Kurono people getting knocked out for now!
Karenina refrains from telling Teddy that the Kurono soldiers were knocked out by her. Otherwise, there will be a lot of questions and paperwork.
Teddy
Wait—what about you?
Karenina
I'm going to investigate where the virus is coming from. Such a large-scale infection can't happen out of nowhere...
The disaster that destroyed the world is on everyone's mind.
Teddy
Could it be the zero-point reactor...? But our inspection confirmed that there wasn't any Punishing Virus in the vacuum chamber when we started the reactor...
Then there are only two possibilities—either the source of the disaster had nothing to do with zero-point reactors, or someone from Kurono tampered with their inspection.
Although Yarha does not seem to be in the know... but what about the others?
Karenina
That's why I'm going to investigate it... What exactly caused the Punishing Virus infection?
Karenina's Inver-Devices stand upright above her head, detecting the Punishing Virus in the air—as expected, a high concentration is detected further inside the reactor.
Teddy
Hey, are you going in alone?! At least wait for us—
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory585.jpg
The static-filled communication suddenly terminates. Karenina sighs before throwing her comms to Yarha, who has just stood back up.
Karenina
You heard it... Teddy and the others are coming to cover your retreat.
Yarha
You're going to investigate the reactor, aren't you, Karenina? Then... you should take this.
Taking the comms from Karenina, Yarha gives her a card as if giving her a return gift. The icon of Norman Mining Corp is printed on the card.
Yarha
I might be the research director in name only... but it still comes with the corresponding clearance. You should be able to make use of it!
Karenina
Are you sure...?
If this is all part of Kurono's scheme, then helping Karenina will certainly make Yarha a traitor to Kurono, seeing that he is one of them.
Yarha
This is an emergency. We do what we must... no matter the cost. You're the only one who can stop this now, Karenina.
Karenina nods, and she ventures deeper into the reactor.
